I use my imagination to dance in my head.

i drink coffee every day.

content.text: I'm a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage. What do you do for work?
I took a break from work to focus on my family, but I'm looking to get back into it.
What kind of work are you looking for?
I'm not sure yet. I'm interested in something that will allow me to work from home and be creative.
I'm a writer, so I can relate to that. I love being able to work from home and have the flexibility to set my own hours.
That's great! Do you have any advice for someone looking to get into writing?

Of course! I'm always happy to help. The best advice I can give is to just start writing. Don't worry about whether or not it's good, just get the words down on paper. The more you write, the better you'll get.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about writing.
I also love to sing. I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
I love Queens of the Stone Age! I've seen them in concert a few times.
They're so good! I'm going to see them again when they come to town next month.
Awesome! I hope you have a great time.
